chart_description: This chart displays the flow of connection tracker expectations on the system, with expectations per second on the y-axis and time on the x-axis. This is useful for monitoring connection establishment in real-time, to see if connections are being created and deleted as expected.

dimension_descriptions.created: Number of new expectations created per second.
dimension_descriptions.deleted: Number of expectations deleted per second.
dimension_descriptions.new: Number of new expectations per second.
